law.catch_line: Motor Vehicle Commission's licensure and supervision of recreational vehicle dealers and manufacturers -- Additional statutory requirements for new recreational vehicle dealers.

text.section: The Motor Vehicle Commission shall, under administrative regulations promulgated by it, issue the licenses provided for by KRS 190.010 to 190.080 to recreational vehicle dealers and manufacturers and shall have supervision over licensees in respect to this chapter and all the provisions of KRS 190.010 to 190.080 that are applicable to recreational vehicle manufacturers and dealers.
New recreational vehicle dealers shall also be subject to the provisions of KRS 190.090 to 190.140 and 190.270 to 190.320.

law.history: Created 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 27, sec. 2, effective January 1, 2015.
